name: get_exercises
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool musclewiki.
Tool description: The API provides information about exercises from MuscleWiki, including the name, category, target muscles,instructions for performing the exercise and a short video demonstration.
API description: Fetch a list of exercises from the MuscleWiki API with optional filters.

force.description: Filter exercises by the type of force (e.g., push, pull). Defaults to None.

name.description: Filter exercises by exercise name. Defaults to None.

muscle.description: Filter exercises by targeted muscle group. Defaults to None.

category.description: Filter exercises by exercise category. Defaults to None.

difficulty.description: Filter exercises by difficulty level. Defaults to None.
